title: General Knowledge Quiz
description: Test your general knowledge with this fun quiz!

questions.question: What is the capital of France?
questions.explanation: Paris is the capital and most populous city of France.

questions.question: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
questions.explanation: Mars is often referred to as the Red Planet because of its reddish appearance.

questions.question: What is the largest mammal in the world?
questions.explanation: The Blue Whale is the largest animal known to have ever existed.

title: Science Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of basic science concepts.

questions.question: What is the chemical symbol for water?
questions.explanation: Water is composed of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom, hence H2O.

questions.question: What force keeps us on the ground?
questions.explanation: Gravity is the force that attracts two bodies toward each other, keeping us on the ground.

questions.question: What is the speed of light?
questions.explanation: The speed of light in a vacuum is approximately 299,792 kilometers per second (or about 186,282 miles per second).
